item.description:
Reply to 'Lie at work got out of hand - is my job at risk?' on /r/AskUK at https://reddit.com/r/AskUK/comments/4lrehk/lie_at_work_got_out_of_hand_is_my_job_at_risk/:

Fake a head injury and when you come back, tell them you lost your Chinese knowhow
